func.title: DoDamage

param.name: change
param.desc: Change of damage value (positive or negative).

param.name: damage_type
param.desc: Damage cause specification which is to be passed to Fx*Damage callbacks of effects (see effect documentation). Default is FX_Call_DmgScript.

param.name: caused_by
param.desc: Number of the player who has caused the damage.

func.desc: Adjusts the damage value of an object. If a change is made, the callback 'Damage' is made in the target object.

example.text: Fells a tree if it's not yet down.
